revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London - April 25, 1895
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London for April 25, 1895, includes a list of presents, meteorological observations, oceanic depths and temperature data, a report on New South Wales census, a paper on fern cultivation, and a discussion on the fallacies of the materialistic theory of physiological psychology. The meeting was chaired by Lord Kelvin and Sir John Evans.
